team_key.description: Default Linear team key (e.g., 'LIN'). Used when no team is specified in commands.

repo_name.description: Name used for repo: label in Linear. Overrides auto-detection from git remote or directory name.

use_issue_types.description: Enable issue type labels (Bug, Feature, Task, etc.) using Linear label groups. When false, types are not tracked.

cache_ttl_seconds.description: How long to trust cached data before re-syncing from Linear, in seconds.

local_only.description: Run in local-only mode without syncing to Linear. Issues get LOCAL-xxx IDs. Useful for LLM-only task tracking.
